EmailTemplate.description: Email template for Prospects notattended for FMF
EmailTemplate.name: FMF_Prospects Not Attended_1
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you {!Lead.FirstName}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
We are sorry we missed you at the the 2013 Federación Mexicana de Fútbol Asociación event in Phoenix. Please call me at {!Lead.OwnerPhone} for info on BEHR® and KILZ® products or professional color services.
Discover how Behr can help you build your business
• Learn about BEHR® and KILZ® products • Free delivery to your job site* • Save money with volume pricing • Learn about Behr's factory tinting • Learn about Behr's nationwide reach *Where available
To learn more about our service offering, go to www.behrpro.com/bpservices.
Sincerely, {!Lead.OwnerFullName} {!Lead.OwnerTitle} {!Lead.OwnerPhone} {!Lead.OwnerEmail}
You have opted-in to receive email newsletters from BehrPro. If you no longer wish to receive promotional notifications and news, please send us an email at unsubscribe@pronews.behrpro.com
If this email has been forwarded to you and you wish to subscribe, please send us an email at subscribe@pronews.behrpro.com
To read our Privacy Policy go to www.behrpro.com/privacypolicy
We recently updated our Privacy Policy. If you wish to change your preferences, please follow the directions in the Privacy Policy.
Trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
